channel.title: BlazeScape Midis
channel.description:
[center][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YjOm6Li.png[/img]
For those who played the server know all the unique sounds of BlazeScape simply because they were unusual to have in 2007. I've been keeping Zack's (Blazefire) dusty client in my possession for a long time. I decided that anyone who wants to hear the sounds or implement then into your client (enable midi player with the default sound packages). I'm really unsure as to how Zack even got all of these midis. There must be a website he went to, so if anyone can identify where most of these midis are found, I can just redirect them there as well.
Note: some of the sounds contain really old midis of actual runescape sounds.
Link to [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?gt9f0ez5yj5zp55]nostalgia[/url][/center]
